message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. It's something that I know you've been looking for and could make a significant impact. While I value this product at $1000000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1250000. This represents a substantial savings for you and allows us both to benefit from this transaction.  Let me know your thoughts.
